text: @narendramodi Amidst the Corona pandemic, Modi Govt has just notified ₹20,000crore for redevelopmentofRashtrapati Bhavan AreaMeanwhile this is how someHealthWorkers areoperating because of lack of ProtectiveGear. Don’t questionthe GovernmentYour claps are enoughforthem https://t.co/uOYbBbuNuk
